amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to national goals for geothermal production and site identification.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3001 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3001 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S325-326; text: CR S325) To modify a provision relating to national goals for geothermal production and site identification.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3001 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3001 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2953.
